abilities.desc: Whenever you roll a 3 or less on the mythical d12 , re-roll it.
After you roll your Action Dice during your turn, you may re-roll one die. Keep the new result, even if it is worse.

actions.name: Beyond Human
actions.desc:
Choose one: You Heal 2; -or- you gain 2 Power tokens; -or- discard up to 4 Status tokens among allies within range; -or- you gain Shield 3.
6+: Choose two instead.
9+: Choose three instead.
11+: Choose all four instead.
